wikipedia_page.main: Sebastian Bergne (born 1966) British Industrial Designer renowned for making everyday objects special with his essential and human approach to design. Sebastian and his team work as an external Industrial design facility for international brands, as a designer and supplier of bespoke objects for restaurants, retailers  and individuals or as producer of a growing collection of personal editions. His wealth of experience makes him sought after as a curator, lecturer and commentator on design.
